contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: Here's how you can reach us for any questions or issues.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to K.M.Construction. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

information_collection.title: Information Collection
information_collection.content: We may collect personal information from you such as your name, email address, and message when you fill out our contact form.

use_of_information.title: Use of Information
use_of_information.content: We use the information we collect to:
use_of_information.item1: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service.
use_of_information.item3: Send you updates and promotional materials, if you opt-in.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

hero.title: K.M.Construction in Cyprus
hero.subtitle: Our company K.M.Construction carries out a full range of construction and installation works for residential and commercial premises.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We provide a full range of professional services in the field of construction, reconstruction and design.

descriptions.new_construction: Providing construction services in Cyprus in compliance with all rules and regulations. With us, you will receive a full range of construction services: from design to full implementation and commissioning.
descriptions.comprehensive_renovation: Comprehensive services for private and business projects: with us, your property will acquire a new look and a modernized technological solution.
descriptions.facade_works: The facade plays an important role in the life of a building: it is its protection, thermal insulation, and decorative element... And in combination with decor, it will not only please the eye but also be beneficial to health.
descriptions.floor_sanding: Modern solutions in the field of concrete and stone floors. We will offer the best solutions to make your floor better.
descriptions.concrete_injection: The injection method allows for the local filling of cracks in a concrete surface, eliminating leaks and restoring the waterproofing properties of the structure. Our company's specialists strengthen load-bearing structures without complex and expensive construction and repair work.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Each of our projects is unique and special.

cta.title: Want to start a project with us?
cta.subtitle: Contact us with any questions today. Want to know more? Write or call us!

sub.design: Design of residential and non-residential premises
sub.supervision_control: Supervision and control of construction works
sub.natural_stone: Sanding of natural stone floors (travertine, marble, granite)
sub.entry_injection: Injection of entries through reinforced concrete structures
sub.stairs_retaining_walls: Construction of stairs and retaining walls

descriptions.floor_sanding: Examples of projects for sanding floors made of natural stone and concrete
descriptions.monolithic_works: Projects of monolithic construction and concrete works
descriptions.extension_construction: Examples of extensions to existing buildings
descriptions.roof_repair: Projects for the repair and renovation of roofing
